author: Al Jazeera
description: Longest-serving James Bond star died aged 89 in Switzerland after a short battle with cancer.
title: James Bond actor Roger Moore dies

author: BBC News
description: The actor, best known for his suave portrayal of James Bond, has died aged 89, his family announces.
title: Sir Roger Moore, James Bond actor, dies aged 89

author: BBC News
description: The actor, best known for his suave portrayal of James Bond, has died aged 89, his family announces.
title: Sir Roger Moore, James Bond actor, dies aged 89

description: James Bond star Roger Moore Dead: British actor Roger Moore, best known for his role as James Bond in films such as “Live and Let Die” and “The Spy Who Loved Me”, passed away today in Switzerland after a brief battle with cancer. He was 89.
title: James Bond star Roger Moore passes away at 89 - Times of India

description: Er wurde in der Rolle des James Bond berühmt: Der britische Schauspieler Sir Roger Moore ist im Alter von 89 Jahren gestorben. Das teilte seine Familie mit.
title: James Bond: Roger Moore ist tot

author: Spiegel Online
description: Als James Bond wurde er weltberühmt: In sieben Filmen spielt Roger Moore den Super-Agenten. Nun ist der britische Schauspieler mit 89 Jahren gestorben.
title: James-Bond-Darsteller: Roger Moore ist tot

description: British actor Sir Roger Moore, who won international fame playing secret agent James Bond, dies aged 89, his family says.
title: James Bond actor Roger Moore dies aged 89

description: Former James Bond star Sir Roger Moore has died in Switzerland at the age of 89 after a short battle with cancer, his family has announced.
title: Sir Roger Moore, James Bond actor, dies of cancer aged 89

author: Jayme Deerwester
description: Roger Moore, the longest-serving James Bond in films, died Tuesday after "a short but brave battle with cancer." He play 007 in seven movies.
title: Roger Moore, star of seven James Bond films, dies at 89

description: British actor Roger Moore, who won international fame playing secret agent James Bond, died on Tuesday aged 89, his family said on the actor's official Twitter account.
title: Former James Bond actor Roger Moore dies at 89 - Times of India
